atk-s0510a20:3_0: 6. Dutiyattherāpadāne yaṁ dāyavāsiko isīti isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā vane vasanabhāvena
atk-s0510a20:3_1: dāyavāsiko isīti saṅkhaṁ gato, attano anukampāya taṁ vanaṁ upagatassa siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a20:3_2: satthuno vasanamaṇḍapacchādanatthāya yaṁ tiṇaṁ, taṁ lāyati chindatīti attho. Dabbachadanaṁ
atk-s0510a20:3_3: katvā anekehi khuddakadaṇḍakehi maṇḍapaṁ katvā taṁ tiṇena chādetvā siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a20:4: 8.Sattāhaṁ dhārayuṁ tatthāti taṁ maṇḍapaṁ tattha ṭhitā devamanussā sattāhaṁ nirodhasamāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa satthuno dhārayuṁ dhāresunti attho. Sesaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a20:5_0: Tatiyattherassa apadāne khaṇḍaphulliyattheroti ettha khaṇḍanti kaṭṭhānaṁ jiṇṇattā
atk-s0510a20:5_2: khaṇḍañca phullañca khaṇḍaphullāni, khaṇḍaphullānaṁ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṁ punappunaṁ thirakaraṇanti
atk-s0510a20:5_3: khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṁ. Imassa pana therassa sambhārapūraṇakāle phussassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a20:5_4: cetiye chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne sudhāpiṇḍaṁ makkhetvā thirakaraṇaṁ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṁ
atk-s0510a20:5_5: nāma. Tasmā so khaṇḍaphulliyo theroti pākaṭo ahosi. Tatiyaṁ.
atk-s0510a20:6: 17. Catutthattherassāpadāne rañño baddhacaro ahanti rañño paricārako kammakārako ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a20:7: 19.Jalajuttamanāminoti jale udake jātaṁ jalajaṁ, kiṁ taṁ padumaṁ, padumena samānanāmattā padumuttarassa bhagavatoti attho. Uttamapadumanāmassa bhagavatoti vā attho. Catutthaṁ.
atk-s0510a20:9_1: ca sampannaṁ nagaranti dvāravatīnagaraṁ, dvāraṁ vatiñca padhānaṁ katvā nagarassa
atk-s0510a20:9_2: upalakkhitattā “dvāravatī nagara”nti voharantīti nagare dvāravatiyāti vuttaṁ. Mālāvaccho
